text: <@U01TJ8PQM8T> Hello, cześć. Have you some idea what you want to do in Julia? Maybe you have some question? And we probably can speak in Polish. To jest prawie tak dobre jak szyfrowanie wiadomości.

elements.text: Hello, cześć. Have you some idea what you want to do in Julia? Maybe you have some question? And we probably can speak in Polish. To jest prawie tak dobre jak szyfrowanie wiadomości.

text:
Hi <@U01E1UPP61L>, it's too soon to tell, yet. I think some light DA, will be my entry point. I think that Pluto notebooks are perfect for it. But I don't have a specified end goal yet. What's your area of choice? :slightly_smiling_face:
(feel free to DM, in Polish, but let's keep the public discussion in English, so everybody can jump in).

elements.text: , it's too soon to tell, yet. I think some light DA, will be my entry point. I think that Pluto notebooks are perfect for it. But I don't have a specified end goal yet. What's your area of choice?

text: You could start a #poland-local channel too if you want :wink:

elements.text: You could start a #poland-local channel too if you want

text:
Yes, keep it in English to every can join. But from time to time I like to see some line that I can't understand, you can feel then that you have here people from all over the world.

I'm now working around symbolic computing in Julia, I need this as intermidiate stape in my pet project about solving differential equations on curved space.
